title: 进一个服务器客户端老崩溃
author: 梦幻龙族Ⅱ
txt_content:

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error

A full error report has been saved to C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\桌面\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-03-29_22.39.05-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: 我叫柠檬
replies.txt_content: 你可能被服务器的OP或腐竹给耍了，因为服务器里有一个插件是可以把别人的整个客户端搞到崩溃，你需要换一个客户端！~~~~~~~~~

replies.author: 我叫柠檬
replies.txt_content: 你可能被服务器的OP或腐竹给耍了，因为服务器里有一个插件是可以把别人的整个客户端搞到崩溃，你需要换一个客户端！
